TB Loader Settings Settings
System Settings
TB Loader Device ID No Device ID configured yet. Please talk to Bill to request one.
Project Filter No project filter. Will show all projects.
Talking Book Default Access Permission Default permission granted. Default permission not granted.
Advanced Settings
Unpublished deployment packages Unpublished Deployment Packages can be accessed on this device for testing purposes. Only published Deployment Packages can be accessed on this device.
Outdated Deployment Packages It is only allowed to install the latest revision of a Deployment Package on a Talking Book. Outdated Deployment Packages may be installed on a Talking Book.
Version: %s Size: %s Expires: %s Never
Download Retry Download Update Remove Choose
Connected to Talking Book: %1$s No Talking Book connected
Select Project Select Community
Project: %1$s\nDeployment: %2$s\nCommunity: %3$s
Sign in Talking Book Loader A very portable TB-Loader. Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer UserActivity Username Password Menu AboutApp Copyright 2016-2020 Literacy Bridge. Talking Book Loader application, for use by Literacy Bridge and partner organizations. This is a highly portable Talking Book Loader. SignUpConfirm MFAActivity ForgotPasswordActivity ChangePasswordActivity VerifyActivity DeviceSettings NewPassword Disable uploading statistics and User Feedback. Simulate Talking Book device. Simulate a Talking Book using storage on the SD card. Use only a physical Talking Book device.
GPS coordinates Waiting for gps…
Set GPS location for community... Add Community to update today...
Community Groups at this location Community Groups to update today
Prefer getting location from network, not GPS. The device will try first to get location from the network, not GPS. This may be faster, but less accurate, and may not work in remote areas. The device will try first to get location from GPS, not the network. This will be more accurate, and works in remote areas, but may be slower. When checked, the device will try first to get location from the network, which may be faster, but less accurate, and may not work in remote areas. When unchecked, the device will try first to get location from GPS, which will be more accurate, and works in remote areas, but may be slower.
Edit preferred greeting Hello, Friend! TB-Loader can display a notification icon in the status bar whenever there are statistics or user feedback waiting to be uploaded. To enable this feature, turn on the \'Important Notice\' setting for TB-Loader.\n\nIf you choose not to enable the feature, notifications will be displayed in a secondary area, indicated by \'…\' in the status bar.\n\nTap Ok to open the \'App notifications\' settings. Then choose \'Set to important notice.\' Open App Notifications No statistics files to upload. %1$s in %2$d stats file(s) to upload. %s left to upload.
Sort by distance Project
Ready to use Project %d projects Tap to choose project. Do not disconnect the Talking Book! Establishing connection to Talking Book [%d]... Uploads are disabled. Uploads are enabled.
